main_definition: To rely on or be influenced by something or someone; to require something as support or basis.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Require the help, action, or presence of something or someone else in order to exist or function
meanings_and_examples.example: The success of this project depends on the cooperation of all team members.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Rely on someone or something for support, stability, or sustenance
meanings_and_examples.example: As a young child, I depended on my parents to provide me with food and shelter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Be subjected to the influence or control of another person, thing, or condition
meanings_and_examples.example: The weather forecast indicates that it will depend heavily on whether we get enough rain this season.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be limited by something; confined within certain constraints or boundaries
meanings_and_examples.example: Her decisions are often dependent on her financial situation and what she can afford.
